attributes.action: Take steps to encourage Original Equipment Manufacturers to install FLOSS software by default.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is in the interests of a continuing free society for ourselves and the future to encourage the blossoming of Open Culture in all its forms. To this end the government should encourage, and remove any obstacles to, the uptake of Free Libre and Open Source Software operating systems being pre-installed on personal computers.
